org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security.JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy

    Package Description
    org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security
    Jackrabbit extensions for access control.

    • Uses of JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy in org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security

      Subinterfaces of JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy in org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  JackrabbitAccessControlList
      JackrabbitAccessControlList is an extension of the AccessControlList.
      Methods in org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security that return JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy[] JackrabbitAccessControlManager.getApplicablePolicies(Principal principal)
      Returns the applicable policies for the specified principal or an empty array if no additional policies can be applied.
      JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy[] JackrabbitAccessControlManager.getPolicies(Principal principal)
      Returns the AccessControlPolicy objects that have been set for the given principal or an empty array if no policy has been set.

      class  AbstractACLTemplate
      AbstractACLTemplate...
      class  UnmodifiableAccessControlList
      An implementation of the AccessControlList interface that only allows for reading.
      Methods in org.apache.jackrabbit.core.security.authorization that return JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy[] AccessControlEditor.editAccessControlPolicies(Principal principal)
      Returns an array of editable policies for the given principal.
      JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy[] AccessControlEditor.getPolicies(Principal principal)
      Retrieves the policies that have been applied before for the given principal.

    • Uses of JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy in org.apache.jackrabbit.core.security.authorization.acl
